TERM: Quality Certification

DEFINITION:
Quality Certification: designed to provide advanced supply chain management capabilities to optimize supply chain operations:

BLUEPRINT DETAILS:
SPR extracted from agi.txt Node ?, type: capitalized_concept. Original SPR name: 'Quality Certification'

EXAMPLE APPLICATION:
ilities to ensure product quality:
    * Quality Inspection: Developing quality inspection techniques that enable the AI system to inspect products and detect defects.
    * Quality Testing: Implementing quality testing techniques that enable the AI system to test products and detect defects.
    * Quality Certification: Creating quality certification techniques that enable the AI system to certify products as meeting quality standards.

55. AI-Driven Supply Chain Management: Mastermind_AI is de
